data.message:
ᔕEᒪᗪOᗰ ᗩᖇᑕᗩᗪE

It has become a home
Build on deprived Architecture
Upgraded then well structured into a Metropolitan.
Substations conjured on narrow paths
well fitted to the corners of a void mind, 
Dark theory to a caved Mine
Aligned with worry of misfortunes that bind the lost to the shattered by artery broken cords
Unburdening puppet masters for strings bare no holds on thus certained rabbit holed hallow souls 
Antiquities of dried wells left deeply dug beyond their cores in pursuit of Freedom and self dependence. 
Instead! continuance it has become a Home
Cold pillars play serenity pillows to hearts  cast aside on the edge where bad meets bottom 
it has become a home without the warmth and comfort of a mothers breast, 
snivel morns from Nights where beasts rock newborns to sleep 

#amoraeffect 
©️  Amora Thapoet
